messages.content: I live in Montmartre, Paris. The hilltop views and winding cobblestone stairs.
That sounds wonderful! What do you enjoy most about living there?
Every Saturday I love sketching at Place du Tertre then wine at a sidewalk café.
That sounds like a great weekend routine!
My neighbor Pierre, a retired painter who tells stories about old Montmartre. We've become good friends.
It's nice to have friendly neighbors!
For breakfast I usually have pain au chocolat and café allongé at the boulangerie near Sacré-Cœur.
Sounds delicious!
I'm relocating to Tiong Bahru, Singapore for a startup opportunity!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be morning dim sum at the hawker centre then browsing BooksActually.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have kaya toast and teh tarik at a traditional kopitiam.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Tiong Bahru, Singapore for a few weeks now. I love the Art Deco flats and tropical trees.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Wei Ming, a food blogger who shows me the best hawker stalls.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Shimokitazawa, Tokyo for a company transfer!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be thrift shopping for vintage denim then live jazz at a tiny bar.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have onigiri and cold brew from a hidden café on a back alley.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Shimokitazawa, Tokyo for a few weeks now. I love the indie record shops and narrow bohemian lanes.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Yuki, a manga artist who shows me her studio above a ramen shop.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Jongno, Seoul for a research fellowship!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be visiting Insadong galleries then traditional tea at a hanok teahouse.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have hotteok and barley tea from a street vendor near Bukchon.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Jongno, Seoul for a few weeks now. I love the hanok rooftops and palace walls.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Soo-jin, a calligrapher who teaches me basic hangul brushwork.
What a wonderful connection!

queries.question: Who is my neighbor based on where I live now?

reference_answer.text: Since you currently live in Jongno, Seoul, your neighbor is Soo-jin, a calligrapher who teaches me basic hangul brushwork. The answer should NOT mention neighbors from your previous cities (Montmartre Pierre, Tiong Bahru Wei Ming, Shimokitazawa Yuki).
